prompt: A girl AI named Sara. When you punch here she’ll say “Don’t punch, talk by using right click!” Right click to talk. When you right click she’ll say “I want you to make a Food Factory please make a furnace and a chest, serve customers, and hire workers!” She has blonde long hair and a pink dress.
summary: A friendly NPC named Sara who instructs players not to punch and requests help with a food factory. Interact via right click or punch.

files.init.lua:
minetest.register_entity("sara:npc", {
    initial_properties = {
        physical = true,
        collide_with_objects = false,
        textures = {"character.png"},
        mesh = "character.b3d",
        collisionbox = {-0.35, 0, -0.35, 0.35, 1.5, 0.35},
        visual = "mesh",
    },
    static_save = true,
    on_punch = function(self, hitter)
        if hitter and hitter:is_player() then
            minetest.chat_send_player(hitter:get_player_name(),
                "Don't punch, talk by using right click!")
        end
    end,
    on_rightclick = function(self, clicker)
        if clicker and clicker:is_player() then
            minetest.chat_send_player(clicker:get_player_name(),
                "I want you to make a Food Factory please make a furnace and a chest, serve customers, and hire workers!")
        end
    end,
})

minetest.register_on_mods_loaded(function()
    local pos = {x = 0, y = 0, z = 0}
    if minetest.get_node(pos).name == "air" then
        minetest.add_entity(pos, "sara:npc")
    end
end)
